summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Chat GPT application with Neural Void design. All core functionality working perfectly including GPT-5.1 integration, real-time chat, message persistence, and responsive UI design.
passed_tests: Chat endpoint (/api/chat) with GPT-5.1 integration - Portuguese responses
End-to-end chat persistence - messages saved and retrieved correctly
Message input field accepts text and clears after send
Real-time typing indicator during AI processing
User and AI messages display with proper styling
Neural Void design implementation - dark background (#050505)
Violet accent colors (#7c3aed) on buttons and AI message borders
Responsive chat container and message bubbles
Portuguese language support in AI responses

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (19/20 tests passed - minor playwright method issue)
